extension.summary: loads your channel PEAR library in Kodi
extension.description:
channel PEAR is a collaborative, cloud-based media platform that enables you to discover, share, and watch live content from around the world on your favorite devices. No downloads or confusing media server setups required - channel PEAR hosts your personal library in the cloud so you don't have to!
Enter your custom Kodi URL in the addon settings. You can get your custom Kodi URL from your library at https://channelpear.com/library/ (must be logged in - click the "Kodi Channel" link at the top right of the page).
This addon was contributed by user "podgod" for Kodi. Original credit to Shani and other devs involved.
